Bash(docker exec timescaledb psql -U crypto -d crypto -c "SELECT now\(\)::time\(0\) AS now, \(SELECT window_start::time\(0\) FROM trade_metrics ORDER BY window_start DESC LIMIT 1\) AS latest_trade, \(SELECT window_start::time\(0\) FROM spread_metrics ORDER BY window_start DESC LIMIT 1\) AS latest_spread;")
